parameters.command: echo 'You are a comedy writer for HELIX COMICS - a Far Side style comic strip about corporate absurdity. The characters are blockhead LEGO-style figures. Write a NEW single-panel Far Side comic about a CTO who tries to use AI to solve a problem that has an obvious simple solution. Include: 1) THE SETUP (one paragraph), 2) THE PANEL description (what we see), 3) THE CAPTION (devastating one-liner). Keep it short, dark comedy, Banksy-meets-Peanuts style. The kid always knows the simple answer.' | /home/angel/.local/bin/claude --print
